drupalNodeEvent.title: Discovering AM Explorer: A New Digital Resource for Teaching and Research in the Social Sciences and Humanities

field_speakers.processed: Joseph Kokula, Eugenio Menegon, Robert Murowchick, Alice Tseng, Catherine Yeh

field_organizers.processed: Boston University Center for the Study of Asia

field_description.processed: We are pleased to spread the word that the BU Library has subscribed to a comprehensive new digital database called Adam Matthew Explorer https://www.amdigital.co.uk/ (a subsidiary of SAGE publishing)! Spanning more than 120 thematic collections, this resource includes several million pages of full-text documents, maps, diaries, posters, ephemera, photographs, and other textual and visual primary source material spanning the 15th through 20th centuries. Join us for a brief series of presentations about this comprehensive resource and how it is being used by students and faculty in a range of courses and departments.
